name: NetEaseMusic Controls English Version
description: Control NetEaseMusic playback and volume with quick commands via AppleScript. Supports play, pause, next, previous, volume up/down, mute toggle, like/unlike song, and more.

args: -c

osascript -e 'tell application "NeteaseMusic" to activate' -e 'tell application "System Events" to tell process "NeteaseMusic" to tell menu bar 1 to tell menu bar item "Controls" to tell menu "Controls" to click menu item "Play"'
-c

osascript -e 'tell application "NeteaseMusic" to activate' -e 'tell application "System Events" to tell process "NeteaseMusic" to tell menu bar 1 to tell menu bar item "Controls" to tell menu "Controls" to click menu item "Pause"'
-c

osascript -e 'tell application "NeteaseMusic" to activate' -e 'tell application "System Events" to tell process "NeteaseMusic" to tell menu bar 1 to tell menu bar item "Controls" to tell menu "Controls" to click menu item "Next"'
-c

osascript -e 'tell application "NeteaseMusic" to activate' -e 'tell application "System Events" to tell process "NeteaseMusic" to tell menu bar 1 to tell menu bar item "Controls" to tell menu "Controls" to click menu item "Previous"'

commands.name: NetEase Increase Volume
commands.description: Increase the volume by one step.

args: -c

osascript -e 'tell application "NeteaseMusic" to activate' -e 'tell application "System Events" to tell process "NeteaseMusic" to tell menu bar 1 to tell menu bar item "Controls" to tell menu "Controls" to click menu item "Increase Volume"'

commands.name: NetEase Decrease Volume
commands.description: Decrease the volume by one step.

args: -c

osascript -e 'tell application "NeteaseMusic" to activate' -e 'tell application "System Events" to tell process "NeteaseMusic" to tell menu bar 1 to tell menu bar item "Controls" to tell menu "Controls" to click menu item "Decrease Volume"'

commands.name: NetEase Like Song
commands.description: Mark the current song as liked.

args: -c

osascript -e 'tell application "NeteaseMusic" to activate' -e 'tell application "System Events" to tell process "NeteaseMusic" to tell menu bar 1 to tell menu bar item "Controls" to tell menu "Controls" to click menu item "Like"'

commands.name: NetEase Dislike Song
commands.description: Remove like mark from the current song.

args: -c

osascript -e 'tell application "NeteaseMusic" to activate' -e 'tell application "System Events" to tell process "NeteaseMusic" to tell menu bar 1 to tell menu bar item "Controls" to tell menu "Controls" to click menu item "Dislike"'

commands.name: NetEase Set Shuffle Mode
commands.description: Switch NetEaseMusic to shuffle play mode.

args: -c

osascript -e 'tell application "NeteaseMusic" to activate' -e 'tell application "System Events" to tell process "NeteaseMusic" to tell menu bar 1 to tell menu bar item "Controls" to tell menu "Controls" to click menu item "Shuffle"'

commands.name: NetEase Show/Hide Lyrics
commands.description: Toggle display of lyrics in NetEaseMusic.

args: -c

osascript -e 'tell application "NeteaseMusic" to activate' -e 'tell application "System Events" to tell process "NeteaseMusic" to tell menu bar 1 to tell menu bar item "Controls" to tell menu "Controls" to click menu item "Show/Hide Lyrics"'
-c

osascript -e 'tell application "NeteaseMusic" to activate' -e 'tell application "System Events" to tell process "NeteaseMusic" to tell menu bar 1 to tell menu bar item "NetEaseMusic" to tell menu "NetEaseMusic" to click menu item "Quit NeteaseMusic"'
